Luxury Appliance Repair services by ZARICCI in Malibu

At Zaricci, we specialize in luxury appliance repair, with factory-trained technicians who understand the precision and performance Sub-Zero demands. Learn more about Sub-Zero’s product line on the official Sub-Zero website .

From the oceanfront villas of Carbon Beach to the gated retreats in Malibu Colony, we deliver premium Sub-Zero service tailored to Malibu’s lifestyle.

We Repair All Sub-Zero Appliances:

  • Built-In Refrigerators
  • PRO 48 & PRO 36 Series
  • Integrated Column Fridges & Freezers
  • Undercounter Refrigeration
  • Sub-Zero Wine Coolers

Common Sub-Zero Problems We Fix in Malibu:

  • Sub-Zero fridge not cooling
  • Freezer warm, leaking, or iced over
  • Loud compressor or buzzing fan
  • “Vacuum Condenser” light won’t go off
  • Ice maker not working or leaking
  • Panel-ready door not aligning or closing fully
  • Fluctuating internal temperatures
  • Control board, thermistor, or sealed system issues

We don’t guess—we diagnose. Every service begins with Sub-Zero-specific testing equipment to evaluate the sealed system, compressor, fan motors, sensors, and control board. No shortcuts. No surprises.

FAQ

Do you service Sub-Zero under warranty?

We’re an independent service provider and not affiliated with Sub-Zero’s warranty program, but we offer out-of-warranty service using genuine Sub-Zero parts.

How fast can you get here in Malibu?

Same-day service is usually available.
